title: The Periodic Table of WordPress Plugins
body:
The Periodic Table of WordPress Plugins




          Over 60‘000 WordPress plugins have been contributed to the
          WordPress.org Plugin Directory.
          Millions of websites are powered by these plugins, developed and maintained by an amazing open-source community around the globe.
          To celebrate the 20th anniversary of WordPress, this table showcases the 108 most popular WordPress plugins in a unique way.
        

Note: best viewed in a desktop browser.
        







                Tweet
              








					  Buy Poster
				  






Rank
Symbol
Plugin Name
Age in Years




1
Yo
Yoast SEO
12




                  Close
                

Yoast SEO

Author: Team Yoast

                    This plugin has been installed on over 5 million websites and maintains a 4.8/5 rating. It was first published in October 2010.                
Improve your WordPress SEO: Write better content and have a fully optimized WordPress site using the Yoast SEO plugin.





2
Je
Jetpack
12




                  Close
                

Jetpack

Author: Automattic

                    This plugin has been installed on over 5 million websites and maintains a 3.9/5 rating. It was first published in January 2011.
